comment._content: Helen Farnsworth Mears (/mɪərs/; December 21, 1872 – February 17, 1916) was an American sculptor.

comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Helen_Farnsworth_Mears There is an extensive article about her in New-York tribune., January 25, 1920, Page 5,. In 1920 was an exhibition of her works at the Brookly Museum.
